summary: The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.
cast: Lane Carroll|Will MacMillan|Harold Wayne Jones|Lloyd Hollar|Lynn Lowry|Richard Liberty|Richard France|Harry Spillman|Will Disney|Edith Bell|Bill Thunhurst|Leland Starnes|A.C. McDonald|Robert J. McCully|Robert Karlowsky|Ned Schmidtke|Tony Scott|Roy Cheverie|Jack Zaharia|Stephen Liska|David Meek|Roger Aaron Brown|Kim Smith|S. William Hinzman|Richard Lewicki|William C. Kennedy|Lynda Marnoni|Walton Cook|Peg Tilbrook|Vincent D. Survinski|Norman Chase|Ross Harris|Rick Catizone|Michael Gornick|Bonnie Hinzman|George A. Romero|Regis Survinski
title: Los Crazies
